post.author: 임정숙
post.content:
회사설립 정보 찾으시는 분들이 많은 것 같아 제가 알고있는 여러사이트들 첨부해 봅니다.  보시고 회사 설립하는데 도움 많이되시길 바라고요 꼭 사업번창하세요. :)

*********************************
Business Start-Up Assistant - Home Page (starting a business, business plan, entrepreneur, market research, financing)
http://bsa.cbsc.org/gol/bsa/interface.nsf/engdoc/0.html

Frequently requested publications - Business
http://www.ccra-adrc.gc.ca/formspubs/pubs/tax/business/menu-e.html

Canada-Ontario Business Service Centre
http://www.cbsc.org/ontario/english/index.cfm

(온타리오) Register/Renew
http://www.cbs.gov.on.ca/obc/english/4TG2AW.htm

(온타리오) Amend/Cancel/Change of Business Information
http://www.cbs.gov.on.ca/obc/english/5GWMMK.htm
post.title: About starting a small business
